item.title: 伦敦新股回流，但基金无现金购买
item.description:
多年来，英国股票的投资火力已经耗尽

。【原文：

Investment firepower for UK stocks has been depleted over years

】

item.title: 富时 100 指数将打破五日连跌走势
埃及通胀回升令华尔街对加息呼声众说纷纭
item.description: 埃及通胀率的意外回升让华尔街对该国 2025 年第五次降息的时机是否成熟产生了分歧。【原文：A surprise uptick in Egyptian inflation has Wall Street divided on whether the time is right for the nation’s fifth interest-rate cut of 2025.】

item.title: 马来西亚制药连锁企业 Big Caring 据称将探索 IPO 事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Big Caring Group Sdn. 正在考虑明年在吉隆坡进行首次公开募股。【原文：Big Caring Group Sdn. is considering an initial public offering in Kuala Lumpur next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿什莫尔表示，英国并非唯一面临另一个 "利兹-特鲁斯时刻 "风险的国家
item.description: 资产管理公司阿什莫尔集团（Ashmore Group）的首席执行官马克-库姆斯（Mark Coombs）说，英国等国家出现赤字并依赖金融市场提供资金，"肯定 "有可能再次出现丽兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）时刻。【原文：Countries such as UK that are running deficits and relying on financial markets to fund them are “definitely” at risk of another Liz Truss moment, said Mark Coombs, chief executive officer at asset manager Ashmore Group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚主要港口铁矿石装运量创十月份新高
item.description: 澳大利亚一个主要出口码头的铁矿石装运量在 10 月份创下历史新高，原因是尽管面临经济逆风，但中国的需求仍有韧性。【原文：Iron ore shipments from a major Australian export terminal rose to a record high for October, as Chinese demand proved resilient despite economic headwinds.】

item.title: 小米实现收支平衡后，将 2025 年电动汽车交付目标提高到 40 万辆
item.description: 小米公司目前预计今年将交付 40 多万辆汽车，这表明其电动汽车业务的盈利速度比同行快得多。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. now expects to deliver more than 400,000 cars this year, showing accelerating momentum from an electric vehicle business that’s become profitable much faster than its peers.】

item.title: 没关系，英伟达说人工智能没有泡沫
item.description:
在黄健翔看来，一切都很美好，但他的视角 却是独一无二的。【原文：

Everything looks great to Jensen Huang, but his vantage point is one of a kind.

】

item.title: 人工智能威胁破坏波兰价值 1 万亿美元的经济派对
item.description:
克拉科夫已成为商业服务工作的中心，其工资水平在波兰名列前茅。

Krakow became a hub for business services jobs, driving salaries to the highest in Poland. Now the city is learning to live with artificial intelligence.

】

item.title: 黎巴嫩愿意听取国际货币基金组织关于弥补 800 亿美元资金缺口的法律意见
item.description: 黎巴嫩总理纳瓦夫-萨拉姆（Nawaf Salam）表示，他愿意听取国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）对一项旨在解决金融部门约 800 亿美元赤字的法律草案的意见，这将为受危机影响的黎巴嫩获得急需的资金铺平道路。【原文：Lebanon’s Prime Minister Nawaf Salam said he’s open to input from the International Monetary Fund on a draft law seeking to tackle an estimated $80 billion deficit in the financial sector, which would pave the way to unlocking much-needed funds for the crisis-hit nation.】

item.title: 英国博彩公司警告将向客户加税
item.description: 博彩公司警告说，如果英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在其预算案中对博彩公司进行征税，他们将关闭商店并削减工作岗位。但赌客们也可能首当其冲：赔率可能会进一步向博彩公司倾斜。【原文：Gambling firms have warned they’ll shut shops and slash jobs if Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves launches a tax raid on them in her budget. But punters are also likely to bear the brunt: The odds might be stacked even further in the house’s favor.】

item.title: 韩国央行会议前首尔公寓价格重拾升势
item.description: 韩国的房地产市场开始回暖，扭转了连续三周价格上涨放缓的局面，这一信号加强了央行在下周政策会议上保持利率稳定的理由。【原文：South Korea’s property market picked up steam, reversing from three straight weeks of moderating price increases in a signal that strengthens the case for the central bank to hold interest rates steady at next week’s policy meeting.】

item.title: 豆油走弱，需求疲软，棕榈油结束五日涨势
item.description: 受需求疲软和竞争对手豆油下跌的影响，棕榈油结束了连续五天的涨势，并创下五个多月来最长的连涨纪录。【原文：Palm oil snapped a five-day rally and the longest streak of gains in more than five months on weak demand and losses in rival soybean oil.】

item.title: 印度力争到 2032 年在芯片制造方面与主要生产国平起平坐
item.description: 印度技术部长表示，到 2032 年，印度的芯片制造能力将达到其他主要生产国的水平。【原文：India’s technology minister said the nation’s chipmaking capabilities are set to be at par with other major producers by 2032, an aggressive timeline that underscores the government’s urge to bolster domestic manufacturing.】

item.title: 额外预算案公布前看跌押注增加，日本债券暴跌
item.description: 日本政府债券跌幅扩大，因为市场正在为首相佐那江隆一将于周五公布的经济刺激计划做准备。【原文：Japanese government bonds extended their losses as markets braced for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s stimulus package, set to be unveiled on Friday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人工智能初创企业 Firmus Technologies 正在进行债务融资谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，澳大利亚人工智能技术公司 Firmus Technologies Pty.【原文：Firmus Technologies Pty., an Australian artificial intelligence technology firm, is in talks with potential financiers, including private credit funds, to raise debt for an expansion of data centers powered by Nvidia Corp. chips, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的加拿大特使认为贸易谈判将在突然中断后重启
item.description: 美国驻渥太华大使说，尽管上个月美国总统唐纳德-特朗普愤怒地终止了谈判，但加拿大和美国仍有机会达成降低关税的协议。【原文：The US ambassador in Ottawa said Canada and the US have a chance to reach an agreement to reduce tariffs despite last month’s diplomatic blowup when President Donald Trump angrily halted negotiations.】

item.title: 中国考虑对房地产行业实施新的刺激政策，金属价格攀升
item.description: 铝、铜和铁矿石上涨，因为有消息称中国政府正在考虑采取措施，扭转中国房地产市场挣扎的局面。【原文：Aluminum, copper and iron ore rose following news that Beijing is considering measures to turn around China’s struggling property market, after a years-long slump that’s dented commodities demand.】

item.title: 在 CPI 目标获得认可后，南非有望降息：日间指南
item.description: 南非正式通过了 3% 的通胀目标，政府也执行了财政纪律，这为决策者提供了宽松的空间，预计南非将降低利率。【原文：South Africa is expected to lower interest rates, after the formal adoption of a 3% inflation target and the government’s display of fiscal discipline provided policymakers with room for easing.】

item.title: 中国五矿集团任命新总经理管理铁矿石贸易商
item.description: 中国国家支持的铁矿石采购商任命了新的总经理来管理公司，因为该公司在全球市场的影响力日益增强。【原文：China’s state-backed iron ore buyer has appointed a new general manager to run the company, amid its increasing influence in the global market.】

item.title: 中国煤矿企业希望现货价格上涨能提振年度合同
item.description: 中国煤矿企业希望近期动力煤现货价格的反弹能促进明年与发电厂签订年度合同。【原文：Chinese miners are hoping a recent rally in spot prices for thermal coal will translate into a boost for their annual contracts with power plants next year.】

item.title: 越南顶级咖啡种植区暴雨威胁作物生长
item.description: 大雨导致越南最大的咖啡种植省份达乐（Dak Lak）的收割工作推迟，而进一步的倾盆大雨则有可能损害作物，并影响世界第一大罗布斯塔咖啡豆生产国的产量。【原文：Heavy rain has delayed harvesting in Vietnam’s biggest coffee-growing province of Dak Lak, and further downpours risk damaging crops and crimping output in the world’s top producer of robusta beans.】

item.title: 白宫要求国会否决限制英伟达出口的法案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，白宫官员正在敦促国会议员否决一项将限制英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：White House officials are urging members of Congress to reject a measure that would limit Nvidia Corp.’s ability to sell AI chips to China and other adversary nations, according to people familiar with the matter, dimming prospects for legislation opposed by the world’s most valuable company.】

item.title: 停战前中国对美磁铁销售创九个月新高
item.description: 上个月，中国对美国的稀土磁铁出口量达到 1 月份以来的最高值，当时双方正在进行贸易谈判，以稳定这种关键工业部件的流动。【原文：China’s exports of rare-earth magnets to the US reached their highest since January last month, when both sides were in trade negotiations to steady flows of the critical industrial components.】

item.title: 危机持续，中国酝酿新的房地产刺激计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在考虑采取新的措施来扭转房地产市场陷入困境的局面，因为人们越来越担心，房地产行业的进一步疲软将有可能破坏中国金融体系的稳定。【原文：China is considering new measures to turn around its struggling property market, as concerns mount that a further weakening of the sector will threaten to destabilize its financial system, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 麦哲伦股价下跌，全球股票主管在调查中辞职
item.description: 麦哲伦金融集团（Magellan Financial Group Ltd.）全球股票主管阿尔维德-斯特莱曼（Arvid Streimann）周三因涉嫌工作关系被调查而辞职，该公司股价创下七个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Magellan Financial Group Ltd.’s stock fell the most in seven months after its head of global equities Arvid Streimann resigned on Wednesday amid a probe into an alleged workplace relationship.】

item.title: 日本木原说他看到了令人担忧的日元单边突然走势
item.description: 日本内阁官房长官表示，日元正在经历令人担忧的突然单向波动，需要密切关注。【原文：The yen is experiencing sudden, one-way movements that are concerning and which require close monitoring, Japan’s chief cabinet secretary said.】

item.title: 亿万富翁支持的印度印度银行计划在调查后进行全面整顿
item.description: 印度最大的非国有贷款机构之一 IndusInd 银行有限公司正准备进行一次全面改革，旨在提高盈利能力和改善业绩不佳的状况，其新任首席执行官在治理结构调整后寻求提高资产回报率。【原文：IndusInd Bank Ltd., one of India’s largest non-state owned lenders, is preparing a sweeping overhaul aimed at boosting profitability and cleaning up underperformance, as its new chief executive officer seeks to boost return on assets following a governance shakeup.】

item.title: 印度婚介公司 Shaadi.com 据称将考虑 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，当地热门婚介服务 Shaadi.com 的运营商 People Interactive India Pvt.【原文：People Interactive India Pvt., operator of the popular local marriage matchmaking service Shaadi.com, is preparing for an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国铜价飙升后旺季需求下降
item.description: 随着中国制造业的繁忙期接近尾声，铜消费却令人大失所望，铜加工企业的生产率跌至多年来的最低点。【原文：As the busy period for Chinese manufacturing draws to a close, copper consumption has largely disappointed, with run rates at fabricators plumbing multiyear lows for the season.】
